quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has. – Margaret Mead
fact: The average talker sprays about 300 microscopic saliva droplets per minute, about 2.5 droplets per word.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
Doctor: Do you want to hear the good news or the bad news?
Patient: Good news please.
Doctor: we're naming a disease after you.
